java.lang.String.value: CREATE TABLE keychain ( userID INT NOT NULL , applicationID INT NOT NULL , username VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , password VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (userID, applicationID) );
SELECT id FROM application WHERE name="{application}"
SELECT * FROM application ORDER BY name

SELECT keychain.username, keychain.password FROM keychain, user, application WHERE keychain.applicationID=application.id AND application.name="{application}" AND keychain.userID=user.id AND user.name="{user}"
SELECT id FROM user WHERE name="{user}"

SELECT keychain.userID, keychain.applicationID, application.name AS application, keychain.username FROM application, keychain, user WHERE keychain.userID=user.id AND application.ID=keychain.applicationID AND user.name="{user}"
INSERT INTO keychain (userID, applicationID, username, password) VALUES ({userID}, {applicationID}, "{username}", "{password}")
INSERT INTO keychain (userID, applicationID, username, password) VALUES ()
